Text: The Beijing GNU/Linux User Group (BLUG) was founded in Beijing on November 19, 2002 and has since met at least monthly without exception.
Triplets:<The Beijing GNU/Linux User Group

Text: Beijing GNU/Linux User Group:  The Beijing GNU/Linux User Group has also been the host of many famous actors of our movement such as RMS, Ulrich Drepper, Mark Shuttleworth or Louis Suarez to name just a few.
Triplets:<Beijing GNU/Linux User Group
